item.description:
Walk through the basketball courts to the rear of the building to find the pool entrance. Practice will begin poolside at 9 am. Wear athletic clothing. Although we won't do any swimming, you will get somewhat wet. Parking is free in the school parking lot. The T station at Porter Square is a 5 minute walk from JFK Elementary.

Practice will start at 9am sharp and end at 10:30 am. We'll do a brief warm up followed by paddling. We focus on technique, timing, and form. We provide paddles and all the necessary equipment--just bring yourself! No paddling experience is required. We have an excellent coaching staff who will teach you everything you will need to know.

Send questions to: Dave Parker at dfitzparker@gmail.com

www.livingroot.org
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the tall guy with a huge bundle of paddles.
item.name: Living Root Dragon Boat - Boston Meetup
